BASIC_INFO.AUTHOR: Sean Oldenburger
BASIC_INFO.PROJECT DESCRIPTION: Automating workflows to reduce manual tasks and improve efficiency at a finance firm.

PLAN:
Website Interface:
- Develop a user-friendly interface for automating workflows.
- Include a drag-and-drop feature for uploading documents.
- Provide a visual preview of uploaded documents.
- Implement a page selection UI for users to choose which pages to extract information from.
- Display a preview of extracted information in a structured format.
- Enable export of extracted data to Word with styling options.
- Ensure secure login with username and password protection.

AI Backend Logic:
- Create an AI system to automate the extraction of relevant information from uploaded documents.
- Ensure an accuracy rate of 95%+ for data extraction.
- Implement PDF parsing logic, including OCR for scanned documents.
- Ensure secure file handling with instant erasure of data post-processing.
- Develop logic for generating structured tables in Word format.

Integration with Existing Systems:
- Assess current workflows and identify key operational challenges.
- Integrate the automation system with existing CRM and invoicing systems.
- Ensure compatibility with Microsoft Power Automate for workflow automation.

Discovery Phase:
- Conduct a discovery session to outline the scope and feasibility of the project.
- Identify specific automations to be developed based on client needs.
- Gather necessary access and information required for the automation process.

Future Enhancements:
- Plan for additional automations based on the outcomes of the discovery session.
- Explore the potential for integrating AI note-taking capabilities during client meetings.
- Consider developing a client portal for secure access to files and information.
SCOPE:
This project aims to automate workflows to reduce manual tasks and improve efficiency at Iconic Wealth, a finance firm. The automation will be developed using AI models to extract relevant information from uploaded documents, ensuring an accuracy rate of 95% or higher. The system will include features such as a user-friendly interface for document uploads, visual previews, and structured data extraction for export to Word format.

AI Advancements will play a crucial role in the project by developing the AI backend logic that handles document parsing and data extraction. The project will also involve a discovery phase to outline the scope and feasibility of the automations, ensuring that the final solution meets the specific needs of the client.
KEY_DELIVERABLES: A user-friendly interface for automating workflows at Iconic Wealth.
A comprehensive discovery report outlining the scope and feasibility of the automation project.
An AI system capable of extracting relevant information from uploaded documents with an accuracy rate of 95% or higher.
Integration of the automation system with existing CRM and invoicing systems.
A structured data export feature that allows users to download extracted information in Word format.
ASSUMPTIONS: Client will provide necessary access to existing systems and data for the automation process.
Client will be available for scheduled meetings to discuss project progress and requirements.
Client will supply all relevant documentation and information required for the discovery session.
Client will assist in identifying specific automations to be developed based on their needs.
Client will provide feedback on the proposed automation solutions during the project.
